Package helper

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.Schedule
  • public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for checking for appointment conflict, appointment alerts, and generates reports.

    • Method Detail

      • checkForExistingAppointments

        public static void checkForExistingAppointments​(int customerId)
                                         throws HasOverlapExcetption,
                                                HasAppointmentsException
        This method takes in a customer ID that is used to check and see if a customer has an existing appointment that would prevent the customer from being deleted. Lambda - The included expression enhances the program by alleviating the need to declare any variables. The lambda expression allows the program to stream the existing appointments and filter the appointments to a list based on if their customer id field has a value that matches the passed in customer. The code will throw an exception if the size of the list has a value greater than or equal to zero.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer ID to reference
        Throws:
        HasOverlapExcetption
        HasAppointmentsException

      • checkForUpcomingAppointments

        public static void checkForUpcomingAppointments()
                                         throws HasAppointmentsException
        This method check for appointments that occur within fifteen minutes of a user logging in. If there is an appointment an alert will state this. If there are no appointments that will be stated also.
        Throws:
        HasAppointmentsException

      • reportByMonthAndType

        public static java.util.List reportByMonthAndType()
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method generates a report of appointments based on the month and type of the appointment. The report is written to a text file in the reports package.
        Returns:
        Returns List of report data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • reportByShift

        public static java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<Appointment>>> reportByShift()
        This method generates a report of appointments based on whether they occur before or after first shift ends at 3pm EST. The appointments before will be categorized as first shift and those after will be second shift.
        Returns:
        Returns List of report data

      • reportByContact

        public static java.util.List reportByContact()
        This method generates a report for each contact that only includes appointments where they are listed as the contact.
        Returns:
        Returns List of report data

      • checkForOverlap

        public static void checkForOverlap​(int customerId,
                                   java.time.Instant enteredAppStartTime,
                                   java.time.Instant enteredAppEndTime)
                            throws HasOverlapExcetption
        This method takes in a potential appointment time for a specific customer ID. Then the existing appointments are referenced to check if the passed in customer id has any appointments that are scheduled during the potential appointment time.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer ID to check for scheduling conflicts
        enteredAppStartTime - Appointment start time to check
        enteredAppEndTime - Appointment end time to check
        Throws:
        HasOverlapExcetption
